allow: Bash(python3.exe -c " import sys, json lines = sys.stdin.read\(\).strip\(\).split\(''\\n''\) for line in lines[-15:]: try: obj = json.loads\(line\) role = obj.get\(''role'', ''''\) if role == ''user'': content = obj.get\(''content'', ''''\) if isinstance\(content, list\): for c in content: if isinstance\(c, dict\) and c.get\(''type''\) == ''text'': print\(f''[USER]: {c[""text""][:300]}''\) elif isinstance\(content, str\): print\(f''[USER]: {content[:300]}''\) elif role == ''assistant'': content = obj.get\(''content'', ''''\) if isinstance\(content, list\): for c in content: if isinstance\(c, dict\) and c.get\(''type''\) == ''text'': print\(f''[ASSISTANT]: {c[""text""][:300]}''\) elif isinstance\(content, str\): print\(f''[ASSISTANT]: {content[:300]}''\) except: pass ")
